text: Sergio Arellano Stark (10 June 1921 – 9 March 2016) was a Chilean military officer. He led the so-called “Caravan of Death". It killed many Chileans from helicopters and established Augusto Pinochet’s hold on power. He was born in Santiago, Chile. Stark died in Santiago, Chile on 9 March 2016 from complications of Alzheimer's disease. He was aged 94. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Chilean generals Category:People from Santiago
title: Sergio Arellano Stark
